settings.label: Form options
settings.default: Google, Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, Word of Mouth
settings.info: Separate each option with a comma

settings.label: Error message
settings.info: The error message that is displayed when no selection is made

settings.label: Other field error message
settings.info: The error message that is displayed when there is no input in the 'Other' field
settings.default: Please fill the text field below

settings.label: Layout
settings.info: Your header section settings won't be applied if you change to a different layout.

settings.label: Main menu background
settings.info: Does not apply to the “Basic” header when the navigation layout is set to “Inside header”

settings.content: Drop-down menu colors also apply to mega-navigation menus and the mobile menu.

settings.label: Light body text
settings.info: Generally secondary to one or more neighboring elements. Includes blog post dates, Twitter timestamps, and breadcrumbs. We recommend using a color with slightly lower contrast.

settings.label: Selected input
settings.info: When inputs are focused or selection controls are activated.

settings.label: Product image background
settings.info: Appears behind product images with transparent backgrounds.
Requires a product review app such as [Product Reviews](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360022104354) (by Shopify).
[Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360021987814#content-containers)
[Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360021987814#layout)

settings.label: Secondary background
settings.info: Highlights content with additional contrast. A soft color is recommended.
[Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360021987814#popups)
Appear behind modals and the mobile navigation menu.

settings.label: Text link
settings.info: Links within rich text areas

settings.label: Social icons style
settings.info: Used in the footer and the password page

settings.label: Custom font
settings.info: [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360035550694-Using-custom-fonts-in-Superstore)

settings.label: Heading font size
settings.info: Does not affect small headings and section headings.

settings.label: Custom font
settings.info: [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360035550694-Using-custom-fonts-in-Superstore)

settings.label: Enable alternate bold font
settings.info: Check this box if you prefer to use a different font for bold weights. We recommend using the same font family as the body text.

settings.label: Custom font
settings.info: [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360035550694-Using-custom-fonts-in-Superstore)
Used in the top-level navigation.

settings.label: Custom font
settings.info: [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360035550694-Using-custom-fonts-in-Superstore)
Used in the Highlights banner section on the homepage.

settings.info: [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360035550694-Using-custom-fonts-in-Superstore)

settings.label: Sign post link font
settings.info: Used with the "Sign post" button style on Superstore's promotional sections. Recommended for long-form call-to-actions.

settings.label: Enable product reviews and ratings
settings.info: [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360022104354)

settings.label: Enable product card spacing
settings.info: Adds space around product grid tiles, forming a "card" around the tile.

settings.label: Show secondary product image on hover.
Emphasize price
settings.info: Shows the product's price above the title.

settings.label: Enable image crop
settings.info: If disabled, white space will be applied around the image. Has no effect when media aspect ratio is set to natural.

settings.label: Show dynamic checkout button
settings.info: Each customer will see their preferred payment method from those available on your store, such as PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

settings.label: Enable cart redirection
settings.info: Automatically sends users to the Cart page after adding a product through the "Add to cart" buttons on product cards and in the quickshop modal.

settings.label: Enable image crop
settings.info: If disabled, white space will be applied around the image. Has no effect when media aspect ratio is set to natural.

settings.label: Roll-over image zoom
settings.info: Only applies to desktop screen sizes.

settings.content: For the best zoom results, make sure your images are larger than 1600px.

settings.label: Show color swatches on product pages only
settings.info: Includes product quickshop and the homepage featured product.

settings.label: Filter sidebar swatches style
settings.info: Requires collection page filters to be displayed “By group”.

settings.label: Color option style
settings.info: Applies to product page and product card swatches.

settings.label: Custom colors
settings.info: Like “Deep Purple: #7000AA” - one color per line, with names that exactly match your variants.

settings.label: Default social sharing image
settings.info: Displays when a page-specific image isn't available.

settings.info: https://facebook.com/pixelunion

settings.info: https://pinterest.com/pixelunion

settings.info: http://shopify.tumblr.com

settings.info: https://vimeo.com/shopify

settings.label: YouTube
settings.info: https://www.youtube.com/shopify

settings.label: LinkedIn
settings.info: https://www.linkedin.com/company/pixelunion/

settings.label: Email address
settings.info: info@example.com

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: 32 x 32px .png required

settings.label: Show lock icon on checkout buttons
CSS
settings.info: Add custom CSS styles to your shop.

settings.label: Javascript: Standard
settings.info: Add custom scripts to your shop. Will be executed normally (at the end of the document <body>).

settings.label: Javascript: Critical
settings.info: Add custom scripts to your shop. Will be executed before anything else (in the document <head>), but cause the page to load a bit slower.

settings.label: Continue shopping link
settings.info: Where to direct customers after clicking "Continue shopping"

settings.label: Use minified javascript
settings.info: Reduces load times by using a compressed version of the theme's files. ([?](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minification_(programming%29))

settings.label: Enable lazy loading
settings.info: Loads images as they come into view. Image resolution is based on screen size to provide an optimum experience for all devices and connection speeds.

options.label: Fast (load all styles before showing content)
Faster (load some styles before showing content)
Fastest (show content before styles have loaded)

settings.label: Style render speed
settings.info: Showing content before styles have loaded can improve page load speed, but will cause a "visual flash" as components appear. If Turbolinks are enabled, this setting will be ignored.

settings.label: Font loading behavior
settings.info: Controls text visibility while fonts are loading. [(?)](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/@font-face/font-display)

settings.label: Use system font
settings.info: Overrides typography settings for a generic system font. Improves load time, but can create inconsistency across devices and browsers.

settings.label: Preconnect to Facebook Pixel
settings.info: Improves page load speed for Facebook Pixel users.

settings.label: Preconnect to Google Analytics
settings.info: Improves page load speed for Google Analytics users.
